translated: are their individual emblems, each with the seed syllable bindu. In each of those, one should imagine the subtle maṇḍala wheels of the thirty-two deities, as in the yoga division.

original: bsdus na de bzhin gshegs pa ni stong phrag gcig dang nyi shu rtsa bzhir 'gyur ro zhes pa ste drang ba'i don to //
analyzed: bsdus na de bzhin gshegs pa ni stong phrag gcig dang nyi shu rtsa bzhir 'gyur ro zhes pa ste drang ba'i don to //
translated: In brief, there are 1,024 tathāgatas. This is the provisional meaning.

original: 'dod pa'i gdugs ni mi bskyod pa ste /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i gdugs ni mi bskyod pa ste /
translated: The parasol of desire is Akṣobhya.

original: de nyid steng dang bar dang 'og gi dbye ba snang ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin yin pas zhal gsum pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid steng dang bar dang 'og gi dbye ba snang ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin yin pas zhal gsum pa'o //
translated: Since it is the nature of the appearances of the divisions of above, below, and in between, it has three faces.

original: smig rgyu la sogs pa rtags lnga dang / 'od gsal ba ni phyag drug pa'o ;
analyzed: smig rgyu la sogs pa rtags lnga dang / 'od gsal ba ni phyag drug pa'o ;
translated: The five signs such as mirage and the clear light are the six arms.

original: / rus sbal la sogs pa ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: / rus sbal la sogs pa ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
translated: The tortoise and so forth are Vairochana and so forth.

original: dkyil 'khor bzhi'i rtsa ni spyan la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor bzhi'i rtsa ni spyan la sogs pa'o //
translated: The channels of the four mandalas are Lochana and so forth.

original: mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / yan lag thams cad kyi tshigs dang / rtsa rgyus thams cad kyi rtsa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
analyzed: mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / yan lag thams cad kyi tshigs dang / rtsa rgyus thams cad kyi rtsa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
translated: The channels of the eyes, ears, nose, tongue, body, mind, all the joints of the limbs, and all the sinews are the bodhisattvas.

original: mig g-yon pa'i rtsa ni gzugs rdo rje ma /
analyzed: mig g-yon pa'i rtsa ni gzugs rdo rje ma /
translated: The channel of the left eye is Rupavajrā.

original: rna ba g-yon pa'i rtsa ni sgra rdo rje ma dang / sna g-yon pa'i rtsa ni dri rdo rje ma dang / lce'i rtsa ni ro rdo rje ma dang / rdo rje'i dbus kyi rtsa ni reg bya rdo rje ma'o //
analyzed: rna ba g-yon pa'i rtsa ni sgra rdo rje ma dang / sna g-yon pa'i rtsa ni dri rdo rje ma dang / lce'i rtsa ni ro rdo rje ma dang / rdo rje'i dbus kyi rtsa ni reg bya rdo rje ma'o //
translated: The channel of the left ear is Shabdavajrā, the channel of the left nose is Gandhavajrā, the channel of the tongue is Rasavajrā, and the channel in the middle of the vajra is Sparshavajrā.

original: dpung pa gnyis dang / lag ngar gnyis dang / kha dang ; gsang ba dang / pus mo gnyis dang / tshangs pa'i sgo dang / rkang pa'i mthil gyi rtsa ni khro bo bcu'o //
analyzed: dpung pa gnyis dang / lag ngar gnyis dang / kha dang ; gsang ba dang / pus mo gnyis dang / tshangs pa'i sgo dang / rkang pa'i mthil gyi rtsa ni khro bo bcu'o //
translated: The channels of the two shoulders, the two forearms, the mouth, the secret place, the two knees, the Brahma aperture, and the soles of the feet are the ten wrathful ones.

original: steng la sogs pa'i dbye bas zhal gsum la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: steng la sogs pa'i dbye bas zhal gsum la sogs pa ste /
translated: The three faces and so on are differentiated as above and below.

original: snga ma bzhin te nges pa'i don to //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin te nges pa'i don to //
translated: This is the definitive meaning.

original: spros pa spang bar bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: spros pa spang bar bya ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to abandon conceptual elaborations,

original: don dam pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bsgom pa bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: don dam pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bsgom pa bshad par bya ste /
translated: the meditation of the ultimate maṇḍala should be explained.

original: slar yang kha sbyar sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: slar yang kha sbyar sbyor ba yis //
translated: Again, by uniting the two,

original: rang gi lus la de rnams gzhug / ces smos pa la /
analyzed: rang gi lus la de rnams gzhug / ces smos pa la /
translated: they are placed in one’s body.

original: de ltar sngar bshad pa'i rim pas lhag par mos pa'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs la /
analyzed: de ltar sngar bshad pa'i rim pas lhag par mos pa'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs la /
translated: As such, having empowered the mandala of imagination through the previously explained process,

original: slar yang kha sbyar sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: slar yang kha sbyar sbyor ba yis //
translated: again, by uniting the two,

original: zhes bya ba ni lus kyi dkyil 'khor dang / phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gcig tu gyur pas rang gi lus la de rnams ni dkyil 'khor pa rnams gzhug par bya ste drang ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni lus kyi dkyil 'khor dang / phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gcig tu gyur pas rang gi lus la de rnams ni dkyil 'khor pa rnams gzhug par bya ste drang ba'i don to //
translated: This is the literal meaning explanation: the body maṇḍala and the external maṇḍala become one, and those maṇḍala deities are caused to enter one’s body.

original: slar yang kha sbyar sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: slar yang kha sbyar sbyor ba yis //
translated: Again, the union of the two lips

original: zhes bya ba ni kha sbyor ni bzhi ste kha gnyis kyi kha sbyor dang / dbang po gnyis kyi kha @32b sbyor dang / rtsa gnyis kyi kha sbyor dang // byang chub kyi sems gnyis kyi kha sbyor ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni kha sbyor ni bzhi ste kha gnyis kyi kha sbyor dang / dbang po gnyis kyi kha @32b sbyor dang / rtsa gnyis kyi kha sbyor dang // byang chub kyi sems gnyis kyi kha sbyor ro //
translated: is the four unions: the union of the two lips, the union of the two organs, the union of the two nāḍīs, and the union of the two bodhicitta constituents.

original: de'i sbyor ba ni de dag gcig tu gyur pas de rnams ni rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis rang gi lus ni dbus ma la gzhug par bya ba ni mi snang bar byas te nges pa'i don to //
analyzed: de'i sbyor ba ni de dag gcig tu gyur pas de rnams ni rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis rang gi lus ni dbus ma la gzhug par bya ba ni mi snang bar byas te nges pa'i don to //
translated: The union of those is their oneness. Those thirty-two nāḍīs are caused to enter the central nāḍī of one’s body, which is made invisible. This is the definitive meaning explanation.

original: phyi'i dkyil 'khor dang / lus kyi dkyil 'khor dang / ngag gi dkyil 'khor dang / sems kyi dkyil 'khor te kha sbyar ro //
analyzed: phyi'i dkyil 'khor dang / lus kyi dkyil 'khor dang / ngag gi dkyil 'khor dang / sems kyi dkyil 'khor te kha sbyar ro //
translated: The external maṇḍala, the body maṇḍala, the speech maṇḍala, and the mind maṇḍala are the union.

original: de rnams kyi sbyor ba ni gcig tu gyur pas so //
analyzed: de rnams kyi sbyor ba ni gcig tu gyur pas so //
translated: Their union is one.

original: de rnams ni dkyil 'khor bzhi ste /
analyzed: de rnams ni dkyil 'khor bzhi ste /
translated: Those are the four mandalas.

original: rang gi lus ni rang gi lus la 'jug par bya ste yi ge'i don to //
analyzed: rang gi lus ni rang gi lus la 'jug par bya ste yi ge'i don to //
translated: One should enter one's body into one's body, the meaning of the syllables.

original: stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi kha sbyor gyis rang gi lus ni chos dang / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i bdag nyid kyi rdo rje 'chad chen po la 'jug par bya ste spyi'i don to //
analyzed: stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi kha sbyor gyis rang gi lus ni chos dang / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i bdag nyid kyi rdo rje 'chad chen po la 'jug par bya ste spyi'i don to //
translated: One should enter one's body, which is the nature of the Dharma and Enjoyment Body, into the Great Vajradhara, who is the nature of the Emanation Body, by the union of the enlightenment spirit of the inseparability of emptiness and compassion, the general meaning.

original: kha sbyor gyi sbyor ba ste snang ba ni snang ba mched pa la 'jug go //
analyzed: kha sbyor gyi sbyor ba ste snang ba ni snang ba mched pa la 'jug go //
translated: The union is the appearance, which enters into the appearance-increase.

original: snang ba mched pa ni snang ba nye bar thob pa la'o//
analyzed: snang ba mched pa ni snang ba nye bar thob pa la'o//
translated: The appearance-increase enters into the appearance-near- attainment.

original: snang ba nye bar thob pa ni 'od gsal ba ste sbas pa'o //🔽aom ni a'a: la'o //
analyzed: snang ba nye bar thob pa ni 'od gsal ba ste sbas pa'o // aom ni a'a: la'o //
translated: The appearance-near-attainment enters into the clear light, the hidden meaning.🔽Om is the A stroke.

original: a'a: ni h'um la'o //
analyzed: a'a: ni h'um la'o //
translated: The A stroke is the Hum stroke.

original: h'um ni aa la'o //
analyzed: h'um ni aa la'o //
translated: The Hum stroke is the A stroke.

original: aa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi 'khor lo la'o //
analyzed: aa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi 'khor lo la'o //
translated: The A stroke is the wheel of the reality realm.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi 'khor lo ni lte ba'i nam mkha' la ste sbas pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi 'khor lo ni lte ba'i nam mkha' la ste sbas pa'o //
translated: The wheel of the ultimate realm is in the space of the navel, that is, it is hidden.

original: chags pa dang bral ba ni chags pa la'o//
analyzed: chags pa dang bral ba ni chags pa la'o//
translated: The free from attachment is in the attachment.

original: chags pa ni chags pa bar pa la'o //
analyzed: chags pa ni chags pa bar pa la'o //
translated: The attachment is in the middle attachment.

original: chags pa bar pa ni 'od gsal ba ste mthar thug pa'o //
analyzed: chags pa bar pa ni 'od gsal ba ste mthar thug pa'o //
translated: The middle attachment is the clear light, which is the ultimate.🔽The union of the relative and ultimate is the union of non-duality.

original: kun rdzob dang don dam pa kha sbyor gyi sbyor ba ni tha mi dang pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis de rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de /
analyzed: kun rdzob dang don dam pa kha sbyor gyi sbyor ba ni tha mi dang pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis de rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de /
translated: By the samādhi of non-duality, all tathāgatas

original: rang gi lus la 'jug par bya ste /
analyzed: rang gi lus la 'jug par bya ste /
translated: should be caused to enter one’s body.

original: rnam par mi rtog par bya ba ni mthar thug pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog par bya ba ni mthar thug pa'o //
translated: The non-conceptual is the ultimate.

original: de nyid bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: de nyid bshad par bya ste /
translated: That should be explained.

original: lus kyi 'khor lor rdzogs sangs rgyas //
analyzed: lus kyi 'khor lor rdzogs sangs rgyas //
translated: The perfect Buddha in the body’s wheel

original: rim pa ji bzhin yang dag bsams //
analyzed: rim pa ji bzhin yang dag bsams //
translated: is properly imagined in the proper order.

original: don dam pa yi rdo rje yis //
analyzed: don dam pa yi rdo rje yis //
translated: By the ultimate vajra

original: de bzhin nyid la gzhug bya bas //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid la gzhug bya bas //
translated: one should enter suchness.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs bsags na //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs bsags na //
translated: Having gathered the assembly of tathāgatas,

original: dngos grub rab mchog 'grub par 'gyur //🔽zhes smos te /
analyzed: dngos grub rab mchog 'grub par 'gyur //🔽zhes smos te /
translated: one will attain the supreme siddhi.

original: lhag par mos pa'i bdag nyid kyi lus kyi dkyil 'khor la sngar bshang pa'i rim gyis rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sum cu rtsa gnyis bshad pa gang yin pa de rnams rim pa ji bzhin du ni phyin ci ma log pa'i rim gyis yang @33a * //
analyzed: lhag par mos pa'i bdag nyid kyi lus kyi dkyil 'khor la sngar bshang pa'i rim gyis rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sum cu rtsa gnyis bshad pa gang yin pa de rnams rim pa ji bzhin du ni phyin ci ma log pa'i rim gyis yang @33a * //
translated: in the sequence of the body maṇḍala.

original: dag par bsam pa ni /🔽rnam par bsgoms te /
analyzed: dag par bsam pa ni / rnam par bsgoms te /
translated: Meditate

original: slar yang kha sbyar sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni don dam pa'i rdo rje ste /
analyzed: slar yang kha sbyar sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni don dam pa'i rdo rje ste /
translated: on the samādhi of union again, the ultimate vajra,

original: rang bzhin med pa'i bdag nyid kyis de ni 'od gsal ba la 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin med pa'i bdag nyid kyis de ni 'od gsal ba la 'jug par bya'o //
translated: which is the entry into clear light by means of the nature of non-entity.

original: de nyid bshad pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs te /
analyzed: de nyid bshad pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs te /
translated: The assembly of tathāgatas is the assembly of buddhas and bodhisattvas.

original: bsad pa ni gang gi tshe mi snang bar byas pa de'i tshe dngos grub rab mchog ni rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang thob par gyur te dgongs pa bshad pa'o //
analyzed: bsad pa ni gang gi tshe mi snang bar byas pa de'i tshe dngos grub rab mchog ni rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang thob par gyur te dgongs pa bshad pa'o //
translated: When they are killed, that is, when they disappear, the supreme siddhi is attained, the stage of Vajradhara.

original: de nyid tshad ma nyid du bya ba'i phyir bshad par ba bya ste /
analyzed: de nyid tshad ma nyid du bya ba'i phyir bshad par ba bya ste /
translated: In order to establish that as a valid cognition, it is explained.

original: 'di don rdo rje phreng ba las //
analyzed: 'di don rdo rje phreng ba las //
translated: The meaning of that is in the Vajra Garland:

original: gsal ba ru ni rnam phye ste //🔽zhes smos te /
analyzed: gsal ba ru ni rnam phye ste // zhes smos te /
translated: It is clearly distinguished.

original: 'di don ni don dam pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi don to //
analyzed: 'di don ni don dam pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi don to //
translated: The meaning of that is the meaning of the ultimate maṇḍala.

original: rdo rje phreng ba zhes pa ni rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las /🔽gsal ba du  ni rnam phye ste //
analyzed: rdo rje phreng ba zhes pa ni rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las / gsal ba du  ni rnam phye ste //
translated: The Vajra Garland is the great yoga tantra.🔽It is clearly distinguished.

original: rab tu gsal ba nyid byas so //
analyzed: rab tu gsal ba nyid byas so //
translated: It is made very clear.

original: zhes lung gi tshad ma nyid du ston to //
analyzed: zhes lung gi tshad ma nyid du ston to //
translated: This shows the valid cognition of scripture.

original: de nyid bshad pa /
analyzed: de nyid bshad pa /
translated: That is explained.🔽The mirror is included in the form aggregate,

original: gzugs phud gtogs la me long dang // sa'i khams dang mig dbang po //
analyzed: gzugs phud gtogs la me long dang // sa'i khams dang mig dbang po //
translated: the earth element, and the eye sense base.

original: gzugs kyang rigs ni lnga pa ste //
analyzed: gzugs kyang rigs ni lnga pa ste //
translated: Form also has five types.

original: khro bo byams pa yang dag ldan /🔽zhes smos pa la /
analyzed: khro bo byams pa yang dag ldan / zhes smos pa la /
translated: It is endowed with wrath and love.

original: gzugs kyi phung po la rnam par snang mdzad bsdu ba dang / de nyid me long lta bu'i ye shes so //
analyzed: gzugs kyi phung po la rnam par snang mdzad bsdu ba dang / de nyid me long lta bu'i ye shes so //
translated: The form aggregate is included in Vairocana, and that is the mirror-like pristine consciousness.

original: sa'i khams la spyan no//
analyzed: sa'i khams la spyan no//
translated: The earth element is Locanā.

original: mig gi dbang po sa'i snying po'o //
analyzed: mig gi dbang po sa'i snying po'o //
translated: The eye sense base is Kṣitigarbha.

original: gzugs la gzugs rdo rje ma'o //
analyzed: gzugs la gzugs rdo rje ma'o //
translated: Form is Rūpavajrā.

original: khro bo gnyis ni gshin rje mthar byed dang / mi g-yo ba ni dpung pa g-yas pa dang pus mo g-yas pa la'o //
analyzed: khro bo gnyis ni gshin rje mthar byed dang / mi g-yo ba ni dpung pa g-yas pa dang pus mo g-yas pa la'o //
translated: The two wrathful ones are Yamāntaka and Acala, on the right shoulder and right knee.

original: byams pa ni rtsa rgyus thams cad la'o //
analyzed: byams pa ni rtsa rgyus thams cad la'o //
translated: Maitreya is on all the sinews.

original: des ni shar phyogs kyi cha dang / me'i mtshams kyi cha la gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor pa rnams bsdu bar bstan to //
analyzed: des ni shar phyogs kyi cha dang / me'i mtshams kyi cha la gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor pa rnams bsdu bar bstan to //
translated: This shows the inclusion of the mandala residents in the eastern direction and the southeast direction.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba'i phung po mnyam pa nyid dang / chu khams rna ba'i dbang po dang / sgra yang rigs ni lnga pa ste //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba'i phung po mnyam pa nyid dang / chu khams rna ba'i dbang po dang / sgra yang rigs ni lnga pa ste //
translated: Similarly, the aggregate of feeling is Samantabhadra, the water element is the ear sense faculty, and sound is the fifth family.

original: khro bo gnyis dang yang dag ldan //
analyzed: khro bo gnyis dang yang dag ldan //
translated: It is endowed with two wrathful ones.

original: zhes smos te /
analyzed: zhes smos te /
translated: This is stated.

original: tshor ba'i phung po la rin chen 'byung ldan dang / de nyid mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
analyzed: tshor ba'i phung po la rin chen 'byung ldan dang / de nyid mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
translated: The aggregate of feeling is Ratnasaṃbhava and that very same is the gnosis of uniformity.

original: chu'i khams la m'a ma k'i'o //🔽rna ba'i dbang po la phyag na rdo rje dang / nam mkha'i snying po'o /
analyzed: chu'i khams la m'a ma k'i'o // rna ba'i dbang po la phyag na rdo rje dang / nam mkha'i snying po'o /
translated: The water element is Māmakī.🔽The ear sense faculty is Vajrapāṇi and Akāśagarbha.

original: sgra la sgra rdo rje ma'o //
analyzed: sgra la sgra rdo rje ma'o //
translated: Sound is Śabdavajrā.

original: khro bo gnyis ni gshin rje mthar byed dang / 'dod pa'i rgyal po ste /
analyzed: khro bo gnyis ni gshin rje mthar byed dang / 'dod pa'i rgyal po ste /
translated: The two wrathful deities are Yamântaka and Kâmadeva.

original: dpung pa g-yon dang pus @33b mo g-yon pa la 'jug go //
analyzed: dpung pa g-yon dang pus @33b mo g-yon pa la 'jug go //
translated: They enter the left shoulder and the left knee.

original: des ni lho'i phyogs dang bden bral mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor pa rnams bsdu ba bstan to //
analyzed: des ni lho'i phyogs dang bden bral mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor pa rnams bsdu ba bstan to //
translated: This shows the inclusion of the mandala deities in the south and the south-west.🔽Discernment, the investigation of phenomena,

original: 'du shes so sor rtog pa dang // byin za sna yi dbang po dang // dri yang rigs ni lnga pa ste //
analyzed: 'du shes so sor rtog pa dang // byin za sna yi dbang po dang // dri yang rigs ni lnga pa ste //
translated: the nose sense-faculty, smell, and the five families,

original: khro bo gnyis dang yang dag ldan //
analyzed: khro bo gnyis dang yang dag ldan //
translated: are endowed with two wrathful deities.

original: zhes smos te /
analyzed: zhes smos te /
translated: This is stated.

original: 'du shes la 'od dpag tu med pa dang / de nyid so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: 'du shes la 'od dpag tu med pa dang / de nyid so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so //
translated: Discernment is Amitâbha, and that itself is the wisdom of discernment.

original: me'i khams la gos dkar mo'o //
analyzed: me'i khams la gos dkar mo'o //
translated: The fire element is Pândaravâsinî.

original: sna'i dbang po la 'jig rten dbang phyug go //
analyzed: sna'i dbang po la 'jig rten dbang phyug go //
translated: The nose sense-faculty is Lokeshvara.

original: yid la 'jam dpal lo //
analyzed: yid la 'jam dpal lo //
translated: The mind is Manjushri.

original: dri la dri rdo rje ma'o //
analyzed: dri la dri rdo rje ma'o //
translated: Smell is Gandhe-vajri.

original: khro bo gnyis ni padma mthar byed dang dbyig pa sngon po'o //
analyzed: khro bo gnyis ni padma mthar byed dang dbyig pa sngon po'o //
translated: The two wrathful deities are Padma-Yamântaka and Nîladanda.

original: kha dang lag ngar g-yas pa la 'jug go //
analyzed: kha dang lag ngar g-yas pa la 'jug go //
translated: They enter the mouth and the right forearm.

original: des ni nub phyogs dang rlung gi phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor rnams bsdu ba bstan to //
analyzed: des ni nub phyogs dang rlung gi phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor rnams bsdu ba bstan to //
translated: This shows the inclusion of the mandalas in the west and in the wind direction.

original: 'du byed bya ba nan tan sgrub //
analyzed: 'du byed bya ba nan tan sgrub //
translated: The formation is the accomplishment of the performance of function.

original: rlung dang lce yi dbang po dang // ro yang rigs ni lnga pa ste //
analyzed: rlung dang lce yi dbang po dang // ro yang rigs ni lnga pa ste //
translated: The wind, the tongue sense-faculty, and the taste are the five families.

original: khro bo gnyis dang yang dag ldan //
analyzed: khro bo gnyis dang yang dag ldan //
translated: It is endowed with the two wrathful ones.

original: zhes smos te /
analyzed: zhes smos te /
translated: This is stated.

original: 'du byed la don yod par grub pa bsdu ba dang / de nyid bya ba nan tan sgrub pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: 'du byed la don yod par grub pa bsdu ba dang / de nyid bya ba nan tan sgrub pa'i ye shes so //
translated: The formation is the inclusion of Amoghasiddhi and that very wisdom of the accomplishment of the performance of function.

original: rlung gi khams la sgrol ma'o //
analyzed: rlung gi khams la sgrol ma'o //
translated: In the wind element is Tārā.

original: lce'i dbang po la sel ba'o //
analyzed: lce'i dbang po la sel ba'o //
translated: In the tongue sense-faculty is Nivāraṇaviṣkambhin.

original: tshigs thams cad la kun du bzang po'o //
analyzed: tshigs thams cad la kun du bzang po'o //
translated: In all the joints is Samantabhadra.

original: ro la ro rdo rje ma'o //
analyzed: ro la ro rdo rje ma'o //
translated: In taste is Rasavajrā.

original: khro bo gnyis ni bgegs mthar byed dang stobs po che ste ;
analyzed: khro bo gnyis ni bgegs mthar byed dang stobs po che ste ;
translated: The two wrathful ones are Vighnāntaka and Mahābala.

original: gsang ba dang lag ngar g-yas pa la 'jug go //
analyzed: gsang ba dang lag ngar g-yas pa la 'jug go //
translated: They are in the secret place and the right arm.

original: des ni nub phyogs dang dbang ldan gyi mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor pa rnams bsdu ba bstan to //
analyzed: des ni nub phyogs dang dbang ldan gyi mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor pa rnams bsdu ba bstan to //
translated: This shows the inclusion of the mandalas in the west and in the northeast.

original: steng 'og khro bor yang dag ldan //
analyzed: steng 'og khro bor yang dag ldan //
translated: It is endowed with the wrathful ones above and below.

original: rang bzhin gyis ni snang ba nyid //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis ni snang ba nyid //
translated: It is the appearance by nature.

original: rnam shes phung por zhugs pa ste //
analyzed: rnam shes phung por zhugs pa ste //
translated: It enters into the aggregate of consciousness.

original: rnam shes kyang ni 'od gsal ba'o //
analyzed: rnam shes kyang ni 'od gsal ba'o //
translated: And consciousness is clear light.

original: zhes smos te /
analyzed: zhes smos te /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: steng du ni tshangs pa'i sgor ro //
analyzed: steng du ni tshangs pa'i sgor ro //
translated: Above, it is the opening of Brahmā.

original: khro bo ni gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: khro bo ni gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba bsdu ba'o //
translated: The wrathful one is the gathering of the uṣṇīṣa cakravartin.

original: 'og ni rkang pa'i mthil la khro bo ni gnod mdzes kyi rgyal po 'jug go //
analyzed: 'og ni rkang pa'i mthil la khro bo ni gnod mdzes kyi rgyal po 'jug go //
translated: Below, it is the soles of the feet. The wrathful one is the king of Sumbha.

original: rang bzhin snang ba ni rang bzhin brgya drug cu ste /
analyzed: rang bzhin snang ba ni rang bzhin brgya drug cu ste /
translated: The appearance by nature is the one hundred and sixty natures.

original: rnam par shes pa'i phung po la'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i phung po la'o //
translated: It is in the aggregate of consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni mi bskyod pa dang m'a ma k'i'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni mi bskyod pa dang m'a ma k'i'o //
translated: The aggregate of consciousness is Akṣobhya and Māmakī.

original: 'og gsal ba la 'jug go //
analyzed: 'og gsal ba la 'jug go //
translated: It enters into the clear light below.

original: 'dir ni 'di skad bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dir ni 'di skad bshad pa yin te /
translated: Here, this is explained.

original: dpral ba las spos pa'i 'od zer gyis rnam par snang mdzad bkug cing de nyid du gzhug pa dang / sha dang @34a * //🔽rus pa'i 'od zer gyis spyan ma'o //
analyzed: dpral ba las spos pa'i 'od zer gyis rnam par snang mdzad bkug cing de nyid du gzhug pa dang / sha dang @34a * // rus pa'i 'od zer gyis spyan ma'o //
translated: The light ray of incense from the forehead invites Vairocana and causes him to enter there.🔽The light ray of flesh and bone is Locanā.

original: mig g-yas pa'i 'od zer gyis sa'i snying po'o //
analyzed: mig g-yas pa'i 'od zer gyis sa'i snying po'o //
translated: The light ray of the right eye is Kṣitigarbha.

original: mig g-yon pa'i 'od zer gyis gzugs rdo rje ma'o //
analyzed: mig g-yon pa'i 'od zer gyis gzugs rdo rje ma'o //
translated: The light rays of the left eye are Rūpavajrā.

original: rtsa rgyus thams cad kyi 'od zer gyis byams pa'o //
analyzed: rtsa rgyus thams cad kyi 'od zer gyis byams pa'o //
translated: The light rays of all the veins are Maitreya.

original: dpung pa g-yas pa'i 'od zer gyis gshin rje mthar byed do ;
analyzed: dpung pa g-yas pa'i 'od zer gyis gshin rje mthar byed do ;
translated: The light rays of the right shoulder are Yamarī.

original: / dpung pa g-yon pa'i 'od zer gyis mi g-yo ba'o //
analyzed: / dpung pa g-yon pa'i 'od zer gyis mi g-yo ba'o //
translated: The light rays of the left shoulder are Acala.

original: de ni me long lta bu'i ye shes thob pa rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: de ni me long lta bu'i ye shes thob pa rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: This is the natural outflow result of attaining mirrorlike timeless awareness.

original: lta ba'i 'od zer gyis rin chen 'byung ldan no //
analyzed: lta ba'i 'od zer gyis rin chen 'byung ldan no //
translated: The light rays of the eyes are Ratnasaṃbhava.

original: shu kra dang chu la sogs pa'i 'od zer gyis m'a ma k'i'o //🔽rna ba g-yas pa'i 'od zer gyis phyag na rdo rje dang nam mkha'i snying po'o //
analyzed: shu kra dang chu la sogs pa'i 'od zer gyis m'a ma k'i'o // rna ba g-yas pa'i 'od zer gyis phyag na rdo rje dang nam mkha'i snying po'o //
translated: The light rays of semen, urine, and so on are Māmakī.🔽The light rays of the right ear are Vajrapāṇi and Akāśagarbha.

original: rna ba g-yon pa'i 'od zer gyis sgra rdo rje ma'o //
analyzed: rna ba g-yon pa'i 'od zer gyis sgra rdo rje ma'o //
translated: The light rays of the left ear are Śabdavajrā.

original: dpung pa g-yas pa'i 'od zer gyis shes rab mthar byed do //
analyzed: dpung pa g-yas pa'i 'od zer gyis shes rab mthar byed do //
translated: The light rays of the right shoulder are Prajñāntaka.

original: lag ngar g-yon pa'i 'od zer gyis 'dod pa'i rgyal po'o //
analyzed: lag ngar g-yon pa'i 'od zer gyis 'dod pa'i rgyal po'o //
translated: The light rays of the left forearm are Kāmarāja.

original: de ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes thob pa rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: de ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes thob pa rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: This is the natural outflow result of attaining the timeless awareness of equanimity.

original: lkog ma'i rtsa'i 'od zer gyis 'od dpag tu med pa dang dro ba'i reg pa'i 'od zer gyis gos dkar mo'o //
analyzed: lkog ma'i rtsa'i 'od zer gyis 'od dpag tu med pa dang dro ba'i reg pa'i 'od zer gyis gos dkar mo'o //
translated: The light rays of the throat channel are Amitābha, and the light rays of the heat touch Sitatārā.

original: snying ga'i padma'i 'od zer gyis 'jam pa'i rdo rje'o //
analyzed: snying ga'i padma'i 'od zer gyis 'jam pa'i rdo rje'o //
translated: The light rays of the heart lotus are Mañjuvajra.

original: sna'i 'od zer gyis 'jig rten dbang phyug go //
analyzed: sna'i 'od zer gyis 'jig rten dbang phyug go //
translated: The light rays of the nose are Lokeśvara.

original: lus kyi di'i 'odro  zer gyis dri rdo rje ma'o //
analyzed: lus kyi di'i 'odro  zer gyis dri rdo rje ma'o //
translated: The light rays of the body’s pores are Gandhavajrā.

original: kha'i 'od zer gyis padma mthar byed do //
analyzed: kha'i 'od zer gyis padma mthar byed do //
translated: The light rays of the mouth are Padmāntakṛt.

original: pus mo g-yas pa'i 'od zer gyis dbyig sngon no //
analyzed: pus mo g-yas pa'i 'od zer gyis dbyig sngon no //
translated: The light rays of the right knee are Nīlāmbara.

original: nges ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes thob pa ni rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: nges ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes thob pa ni rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: The attainment of the wisdom of discernment is the natural outflow result.

original: gsang ba'i 'od zer gyis don yong par grub pa'o //
analyzed: gsang ba'i 'od zer gyis don yong par grub pa'o //
translated: The light rays of the secret place are Amoghasiddhi.

original: 'gro ba la sogs pa'i 'od zer gyis sgrol ma'o //🔽rdo rje rtse mo'i 'od zer gyis sel ba'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba la sogs pa'i 'od zer gyis sgrol ma'o // rdo rje rtse mo'i 'od zer gyis sel ba'o //
translated: The light rays of going and so on are Tārā.🔽The light rays of the tip of the vajra are Uṣṇīṣa.

original: lce'i 'od zer gyis ro rdo rje ma'o //
analyzed: lce'i 'od zer gyis ro rdo rje ma'o //
translated: The light rays of the tongue are Rasavajra.

original: tshigs thams cad kyi 'od zer gyis kun du bzang po'o //
analyzed: tshigs thams cad kyi 'od zer gyis kun du bzang po'o //
translated: The light rays of all the joints are Samantabhadra.

original: gsang ba'i 'od zer gyis bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'o //
analyzed: gsang ba'i 'od zer gyis bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'o //
translated: The light rays of the secret place are Amṛtakuṇḍali.

original: pus mo g-yas pa'i 'od zer gyis stobs po che'o //
analyzed: pus mo g-yas pa'i 'od zer gyis stobs po che'o //
translated: The light rays from the right knee are Mahābala.

original: tshangs pa'i sgo'i 'od zer gyis gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'o //
analyzed: tshangs pa'i sgo'i 'od zer gyis gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'o //
translated: The light rays from the brahma aperture are uṣṇīṣa cakravartin.

original: rkad  pa'i 'og gi 'od zer gyis gnod mdzes 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: rkad  pa'i 'og gi 'od zer gyis gnod mdzes 'jug par bya'o //
translated: The light rays from the soles of the feet are Sumbha.

original: des ni bya ba nan tan sgrub pa'i ye shes thob pa ni rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: des ni bya ba nan tan sgrub pa'i ye shes thob pa ni rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: The attainment of the gnosis of successful activities is the result that resembles the cause.

original: des na reg bya rdo rje ma dang snyoms par zhugs pa'i rim gyis tshangs pa'i bu gnas byang chub kyi sems 'dzag @34b pa dang ; yan lag gi tshigs thams cad la byang chub kyi sems phyin pa dang / rdo rje'i dkyil du byang chub kyi sems 'bab pa'i tshe shes rab dang /
analyzed: des na reg bya rdo rje ma dang snyoms par zhugs pa'i rim gyis tshangs pa'i bu gnas byang chub kyi sems 'dzag @34b pa dang ; yan lag gi tshigs thams cad la byang chub kyi sems phyin pa dang / rdo rje'i dkyil du byang chub kyi sems 'bab pa'i tshe shes rab dang /
translated: Then, through the process of entering into union with Sparśavajrā, the bodhicitta descends from the brahma aperture, the bodhicitta arrives at all the joints of the limbs, and when the bodhicitta arrives at the center of the vajra, the bodhicitta is filled with the nature of method and wisdom.

original: thabs dang ma rig pa'i rang bzhin spangs la /
analyzed: thabs dang ma rig pa'i rang bzhin spangs la /
translated: The bodhicitta is filled with the nature of method and wisdom.

original: rnam par shes pa gsum nub cing 'od gsal ba'i sngon du 'gro bas dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha'i rnam par dag pas rtags lnga ma mthong ste /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa gsum nub cing 'od gsal ba'i sngon du 'gro bas dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha'i rnam par dag pas rtags lnga ma mthong ste /
translated: Since the three consciousnesses have subsided and are preceded by clear light, the five signs are not seen due to the purities of water, fire, wind, space, and earth.

original: thams cad stong pa 'od gsal ba nyams su myong zhing yab yum zhu nas thig ler 'gyur zhing thig le yang sgra dang sgra tsam gyis thim la rang dang gzhan gyi dbye ba mchog tu 'dzin pa med pas 'ba' zhig dri ma med pa /
analyzed: thams cad stong pa 'od gsal ba nyams su myong zhing yab yum zhu nas thig ler 'gyur zhing thig le yang sgra dang sgra tsam gyis thim la rang dang gzhan gyi dbye ba mchog tu 'dzin pa med pas 'ba' zhig dri ma med pa /
translated: The experience of clear light, the emptiness of everything, melts the father and mother into a drop, and the drop dissolves into sound and mere sound. Since there is no clinging to the distinction of self and other, it is exclusively stainless.

original: mtha' yas pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i ye shes mngon du bya'o //
analyzed: mtha' yas pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i ye shes mngon du bya'o //
translated: The infinite pristine consciousness that is similar to space is actualized.

original: 'dis chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes mngon du bya ba ni rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu dang / rnam par shes pa'i phung po yang gnas par 'gyur ro zhes don dam pa'i dkyil 'khor /
analyzed: 'dis chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes mngon du bya ba ni rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu dang / rnam par shes pa'i phung po yang gnas par 'gyur ro zhes don dam pa'i dkyil 'khor /
translated: This is the ultimate maṇḍala, which actualizes the pristine consciousness of the dharmadhātu, the result of natural outflow, and the aggregate of consciousness is also stabilized.

original: de nyid brtan par bya ba'i phyir ;
analyzed: de nyid brtan par bya ba'i phyir ;
translated: In order to stabilize that,

original: / mya ngan 'das bcas kun slong dang / chos kyi sku yang bshad pa yin //
analyzed: / mya ngan 'das bcas kun slong dang / chos kyi sku yang bshad pa yin //
translated: and also the nirvana, the motivation, and the Dharma Body.

original: bstan par bya ba'i don du ni //
analyzed: bstan par bya ba'i don du ni //
translated: For the sake of teaching,

original: gsang sngags 'di ni brjod par bya //
analyzed: gsang sngags 'di ni brjod par bya //
translated: this mantra is to be uttered.

original: zhes smos te de nyid mya ngan las 'das pa ste /
analyzed: zhes smos te de nyid mya ngan las 'das pa ste /
translated: That itself is nirvana,

original: mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyi mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyi mtshan nyid do //
translated: having the characteristic of the realm of non-abiding nirvana.

original: de nyid kun slong ni de kho na nyid bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kun slong ni de kho na nyid bzhi pa'o //
translated: That itself is the motivation, the four realities.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de nyid chos kyi sku bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de nyid chos kyi sku bshad pa yin te /
translated: It is the explanation of the Dharma Body of the Buddhas, the Blessed Ones,

original: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rnam pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rnam pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the aspect of non-conceptual wisdom.

original: gang gi tshe bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas nyid thob pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas nyid thob pa de'i tshe /
translated: When a Bodhisattva attains Buddhahood through three incalculable aeons,

original: sngags kyi theg pa la de las khyad par gang yin zhes rtog ste /
analyzed: sngags kyi theg pa la de las khyad par gang yin zhes rtog ste /
translated: what is the difference in the Mantra Vehicle at that time?

original: sngags kyi theg pa la sngags kyi mthu bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: sngags kyi theg pa la sngags kyi mthu bshad par bya ste /
translated: In the Mantra Vehicle, the power of mantra is to be explained.

original: de kho na nyid de bstan pa'i don du ni mi g-yo bar bya ba'i phyir 'og nas bshad pa'i sngags 'di brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: de kho na nyid de bstan pa'i don du ni mi g-yo bar bya ba'i phyir 'og nas bshad pa'i sngags 'di brjod par bya ste /
translated: For the purpose of teaching thatness, one should recite this mantra, which will be explained below, in order to be unmoving.

original: nang gi bzlas pa dang / rdo rje'i tshig gis zhes tshig gi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: nang gi bzlas pa dang / rdo rje'i tshig gis zhes tshig gi lhag ma'o //
translated: The inner repetition and the vajra words are the remainder of the verse.

original: sngags brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: sngags brjod par bya ste /
translated: One should recite the mantra.

original: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham zhes bya ba la /
translated: Om shunyata jnana vajra svabhava atmako ’ham.

original: aom ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
analyzed: aom ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
translated: Om is Vairochana.

original: sh'u n+ya t'a ni rin chen 'byung ldan no //🔽dzny'a na ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
analyzed: sh'u n+ya t'a ni rin chen 'byung ldan no // dzny'a na ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
translated: Shunyata is Ratnasambhava.🔽Jñana is Amitabha.

original: badzra ni mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: badzra ni mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: Vajra is Akshobhya.

original: sv'a bh'a ba a'atma ko ni don yod grub @35a * //
analyzed: sv'a bh'a ba a'atma ko ni don yod grub @35a * //
translated: Svabhava atmako is Amoghasiddhi.

original: ba'o // aa ham zhes bya ba ni drug pa rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: ba'o // aa ham zhes bya ba ni drug pa rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
translated: Aha is the sixth, Great Vajradhara.

original: des ni de bzhin gshegs pa drug gi nga rgyal bya ste /
analyzed: des ni de bzhin gshegs pa drug gi nga rgyal bya ste /
translated: Thus one should perform the pride of the six transcendent lords,

original: rdo rje 'chang ni kun gyi bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang ni kun gyi bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because Vajradhara is the nature of all.

original: yang na aom sh'u n+ya t'a zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid kyi rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o //
analyzed: yang na aom sh'u n+ya t'a zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid kyi rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o //
translated: Or else, Oṃ śūnyatā-jñāna-vajra-svabhāvātmako ’ham is the door of liberation of emptiness.

original: dzny'a na badzra ni mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o //
analyzed: dzny'a na badzra ni mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o //
translated: Jñāna-vajra is the door of liberation of signlessness.

original: sva bh'a ba a'atma ko ni smon pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o //
analyzed: sva bh'a ba a'atma ko ni smon pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o //
translated: Svabhāva-ātmako ’ham is the door of liberation of wishlessness.

original: de'i rang bzhin du aa ham zhes nga rgyal bya'o //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin du aa ham zhes nga rgyal bya'o //
translated: One should have the pride of being of the nature of that.

original: nye bar bsdu ba bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: nye bar bsdu ba bshad par bya ste /
translated: The summary should be explained.

original: 'di ni don de ma dkyil 'khor te //
analyzed: 'di ni don de ma dkyil 'khor te //
translated: This is the ultimate maṇḍala,

original: snang ba med cing mtshan nyid med //
analyzed: snang ba med cing mtshan nyid med //
translated: without appearance, without characteristics,

original: don dam bden pa zhes bya ba //
analyzed: don dam bden pa zhes bya ba //
translated: called the ultimate truth,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
translated: the abode of all tathāgatas.

original: zhes smos te /
analyzed: zhes smos te /
translated: This is what is said.

original: de ni sngar bshad pa'o //
analyzed: de ni sngar bshad pa'o //
translated: That has been explained before.

original: don dam pa'i dkyil 'khor phung po lnga dang / dbang po dang / yul dang / khams nye bar sdud par byed pa'o //
analyzed: don dam pa'i dkyil 'khor phung po lnga dang / dbang po dang / yul dang / khams nye bar sdud par byed pa'o //
translated: The ultimate maṇḍala is the five aggregates, the sense faculties, the sense objects, and the elements, which are included.

original: mtha' drug las kyang lnga bcu nas brtsams te ;
analyzed: mtha' drug las kyang lnga bcu nas brtsams te ;
translated: From among the six topics, beginning from fifty,

original: phung po la sogs pa btung bar bya'o //
analyzed: phung po la sogs pa btung bar bya'o //
translated: the aggregates and so forth should be drunk.

original: de'i don 'di yin te /
analyzed: de'i don 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of that is this.

original: gzugs ni rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: gzugs ni rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: Form is twofold:

original: kha dog gi rnam pa bcu gnyis dang / dbyibs kyi bdag nyid brgyad do //
analyzed: kha dog gi rnam pa bcu gnyis dang / dbyibs kyi bdag nyid brgyad do //
translated: twelve types of color and eight types of shape.

original: dbang po'i dbye pas tshor ba ni bco brgyad do //
analyzed: dbang po'i dbye pas tshor ba ni bco brgyad do //
translated: Feeling is eighteenfold, according to the differentiation of the sense faculties.

original: 'du shes ni gcig go //
analyzed: 'du shes ni gcig go //
translated: There is only one type of perception.

original: dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i 'du byed rnam pa gsum mo //
analyzed: dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i 'du byed rnam pa gsum mo //
translated: There are three types of formations, wholesome, unwholesome and undefined.

original: kun gzhi la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam par shes pa ni brgyad de /
analyzed: kun gzhi la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam par shes pa ni brgyad de /
translated: Consciousness is eightfold, according to the differentiation of the store-consciousness, etc.

original: lnga bcu de dag don dam pa'i bsgoms pas btung ba ni bsdu bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: lnga bcu de dag don dam pa'i bsgoms pas btung ba ni bsdu bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: These fifty should be understood as the ultimate truth, which is to be realized by meditation.

original: snying por gyur pas na dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: snying por gyur pas na dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The maṇḍala is the essence, because it is the cause.

original: rang bzhin dang snang ba bral bas na snang ba med pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin dang snang ba bral bas na snang ba med pa'o //
translated: It is without appearance, because it is free from the appearance of the duality of subject and object.

original: mtshan ni bzhi ste /
analyzed: mtshan ni bzhi ste /
translated: The characteristics are four:

original: skye ba dang / gnas pa dang / rga ba dang / mi rtag pa'o //
analyzed: skye ba dang / gnas pa dang / rga ba dang / mi rtag pa'o //
translated: arising, enduring, decaying and impermanent.

original: de dang bral bas na mtshan nyid med pas te /
analyzed: de dang bral bas na mtshan nyid med pas te /
translated: It is without characteristics, because it is free from those.

original: 'dus ma byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is unconditioned, because it is not subject to arising, etc.

original: de nyid don dam pa'i bden pa ste /
analyzed: de nyid don dam pa'i bden pa ste /
translated: That itself is the ultimate truth.

original: kun rdzob nye bar bsdus pa'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: kun rdzob nye bar bsdus pa'i phyir ro ;
translated: because the relative is subsumed therein.

original: / de nyid kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas te /
analyzed: / de nyid kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas te /
translated: Therefore, it is the abode of all tathāgatas,

original: skye ba'i gnas yin la /
analyzed: skye ba'i gnas yin la /
translated: the place of birth,

original: sngar bshad pa'i rim pas thams cad de nyid du bsdu zhing 'og nas bshad pa'i rim pas de nyid nas 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sngar bshad pa'i rim pas thams cad de nyid du bsdu zhing 'og nas bshad pa'i rim pas de nyid nas 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because everything is subsumed therein in the manner explained above, and because it arises from that in the manner to be explained below.

original: da ni chad pa'i phyogs spang bar bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni chad pa'i phyogs spang bar bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to abandon the extreme of nihilism,

original: don dam @35b pa'i bden pa las ldang ba bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: don dam @35b pa'i bden pa las ldang ba bstan par bya ste /
translated: the arising from ultimate truth is to be explained.

original: 'od gsal bar ni rab zhugs nas //
analyzed: 'od gsal bar ni rab zhugs nas //
translated: Having entered into clear light,

original: ldang pa yang ni bstan par bya //
analyzed: ldang pa yang ni bstan par bya //
translated: the arising is also to be explained.

original: zhes smos te /
analyzed: zhes smos te /
translated: That is,

original: sngar bshad pa'i rim gyis 'od gsal ba ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes la zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor pa gang yin pa de'i de las ldang ba ni 'og nas bshad pa'i rim gyis lha'i sku 'dzin pa bstan par bya ba ni bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: sngar bshad pa'i rim gyis 'od gsal ba ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes la zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor pa gang yin pa de'i de las ldang ba ni 'og nas bshad pa'i rim gyis lha'i sku 'dzin pa bstan par bya ba ni bshad par bya ste /
translated: the arising of the yogi who has entered into clear light, the gnosis of the realm of phenomena, in the manner explained above, is to be explained, is to be taught, in the manner to be explained below, as the retention of the divine body.

original: snga ma'i smon lam 'bras bur bcas pa dang / chad pa'i lta ba spong ba dang / sems can gyi don bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snga ma'i smon lam 'bras bur bcas pa dang / chad pa'i lta ba spong ba dang / sems can gyi don bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The former is the result of the vow, and the latter is for the sake of abandoning the view of annihilation and for the sake of benefiting sentient beings.

original: de nyid bshad pa /
analyzed: de nyid bshad pa /
translated: That is explained:

original: sngags kyi sku yi sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: sngags kyi sku yi sbyor ba yis //
translated: By the application of the mantra body,

original: lha yi gzugs la dmigs pa'i phyir //
analyzed: lha yi gzugs la dmigs pa'i phyir //
translated: because of the visualization of the form of the deity.

original: zhes smos te /
analyzed: zhes smos te /
translated: It is said.

original: sngags yongs su gyur pa las skyes pa'i sku ni sngags kyi ste /
analyzed: sngags yongs su gyur pa las skyes pa'i sku ni sngags kyi ste /
translated: The mantra body is the body born from the transformation of the mantra.

original: rdo rje 'chang la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: It has the characteristic of Vajradhara and so forth.

original: de'i sbyor ba ni bsgom pa'i rang bzhin gyi shes rab kyis mngon du byed pa'o //
analyzed: de'i sbyor ba ni bsgom pa'i rang bzhin gyi shes rab kyis mngon du byed pa'o //
translated: Its application is the realization by the wisdom of the nature of meditation.

original: des lha'i gzugs ni lha sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: des lha'i gzugs ni lha sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The form of the deity is the maṇḍala of the thirty-two deities.

original: de la dmigs pa ni spro ba sngon du 'gro bar bsgom pa ste /
analyzed: de la dmigs pa ni spro ba sngon du 'gro bar bsgom pa ste /
translated: The visualization of that is the meditation preceded by emanation.

original: de'i phyir de ni de'i don du'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir de ni de'i don du'o //
translated: Therefore, that is for that purpose.

original: des ni ting nge 'dzin gsum bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: des ni ting nge 'dzin gsum bstan pa yin no //
translated: By that, the three samādhis are taught.

original: de la sngags kyi sku'i sbyor ba ni dang po'i sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: de la sngags kyi sku'i sbyor ba ni dang po'i sbyor ba'o //
translated: Among them, the application of the mantra body is the first application.

original: lha'i gzugs la dmigs pa'i phyir ni dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog dang / las rgyal ba mchog bstan to //
analyzed: lha'i gzugs la dmigs pa'i phyir ni dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog dang / las rgyal ba mchog bstan to //
translated: The mandala of the supreme king and the supreme victor of actions are taught because they focus on the form of the deity.

original: de nyid bshad pa /
analyzed: de nyid bshad pa /
translated: That is explained:

original: nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas pa //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas pa //
translated: In the center of the realm of space,

original: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya //
analyzed: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya //
translated: one should meditate on the mandala of the sun.

original: sngags pas kyang ni de steng du //
analyzed: sngags pas kyang ni de steng du //
translated: The mantrin should also imagine

original: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bsam //🔽der yang padma 'dab ma brgyad ;
analyzed: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bsam // der yang padma 'dab ma brgyad ;
translated: above that the mandala of the moon.🔽There, one should meditate on an eight-petaled lotus,

original: / kha dog dmar po bsgom par bya //🔽zhes smos te /
analyzed: / kha dog dmar po bsgom par bya // zhes smos te /
translated: red in color.

original: 'dis ni gdan gyi dbye ba bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: 'dis ni gdan gyi dbye ba bshad par bya ste /
translated: This explains the division of the seats.

original: re zhig dang po sna tshogs padma'i steng du yi ge h'um sngon po bkod la de'i 'od zer gyis nam mkha' las mi bskyod pa'i rigs bkug cing bcug la /
analyzed: re zhig dang po sna tshogs padma'i steng du yi ge h'um sngon po bkod la de'i 'od zer gyis nam mkha' las mi bskyod pa'i rigs bkug cing bcug la /
translated: First, on top of a variegated lotus, one should arrange a blue syllable hūṃ. With its light rays, one should summon and absorb the Akṣobhya family from space.

original: de yongs su gyur pa las cha bcu gnyis ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i dpe byad kyi rang bzhin bsgom mo //
analyzed: de yongs su gyur pa las cha bcu gnyis ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i dpe byad kyi rang bzhin bsgom mo //
translated: From that completely transformed, one should meditate on a twelve-part sun mandala blazing like the fire at the end of the eon, the nature of the signs of excellence.

original: de nas de'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge aom dkar po bkod la /
analyzed: de nas de'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge aom dkar po bkod la /
translated: Then, on the mandala of the sun, one should arrange the white syllable oṃ.

original: de'i 'od zer gyis nam mkha' las rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs bkug cing bcug la de @36a * //
analyzed: de'i 'od zer gyis nam mkha' las rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs bkug cing bcug la de @36a * //
translated: By its light rays, one should summon and absorb the family of Vairocana from space.

original: yongs su gyur pa las cha bcu drug gi rang bzhin dkar po skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi ngo bo zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam mo //
analyzed: yongs su gyur pa las cha bcu drug gi rang bzhin dkar po skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi ngo bo zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam mo //
translated: That, having completely transformed, one should imagine a moon mandala, white in color, the nature of sixteen parts, the essence of the thirty-two marks of a great being.

original: de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du kha dog dmar po'i yi ge aa bkod la de'i 'od zer gyis nam mkha' las 'od dpag tu med pa'i rigs bkug cing bcug la de yongs su gyur pa las padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa bsam ste drang
analyzed: de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du kha dog dmar po'i yi ge aa bkod la de'i 'od zer gyis nam mkha' las 'od dpag tu med pa'i rigs bkug cing bcug la de yongs su gyur pa las padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa bsam ste drang
translated: Then, on the moon mandala, one should arrange the red syllable a. By its light rays, one should summon and absorb the family of Amitābha from space. That, having completely transformed, one should imagine an eight-petaled red lotus.

original: ba'i don to //
analyzed: ba'i don to //
translated: This is the interpretable meaning.

original: mi bskyod pa'i rang bzhin nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang / rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / 'od dpag tu med pa'i rang bzhin gyi padma'o //
analyzed: mi bskyod pa'i rang bzhin nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang / rnam par snang mdzad kyi rang bzhin zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / 'od dpag tu med pa'i rang bzhin gyi padma'o //
translated: The nature of Akshobhya is the sun mandala, the nature of Vairochana is the moon mandala, and the nature of Amitabha is the lotus.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin nyi ma dang / me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin zla ba dang / so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin padma'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin nyi ma dang / me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin zla ba dang / so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin padma'o //
translated: The nature of the wisdom of the sphere of reality is the sun, the nature of the wisdom of the mirror is the moon, and the nature of the wisdom of discernment is the lotus.

original: mngon spyod ni nyi ma dang / zhi ba ni zla ba dang / dbang ni padma'o //
analyzed: mngon spyod ni nyi ma dang / zhi ba ni zla ba dang / dbang ni padma'o //
translated: The nature of wrathful action is the sun, the nature of pacifying action is the moon, and the nature of controlling action is the lotus.

original: sems kyi rang bzhin nyi ma dang / lus kyi rang bzhin zla ba dang / ngag gi rang bzhin padma'o //
analyzed: sems kyi rang bzhin nyi ma dang / lus kyi rang bzhin zla ba dang / ngag gi rang bzhin padma'o //
translated: The nature of the mind is the sun, the nature of the body is the moon, and the nature of speech is the lotus.

original: khrag gi khams ni nyi ma dang / shu kra'i khams ni zla ba dang / de dag gi rten ni padma'o //
analyzed: khrag gi khams ni nyi ma dang / shu kra'i khams ni zla ba dang / de dag gi rten ni padma'o //
translated: The blood element is the sun, the semen element is the moon, and their support is the lotus.

original: dbus ma'i rtsa nyi ma dang / g-yon pa'i zla ba dang / g-yas pa'i padma'o //
analyzed: dbus ma'i rtsa nyi ma dang / g-yon pa'i zla ba dang / g-yas pa'i padma'o //
translated: The central channel is the sun, the left channel is the moon, and the right channel is the lotus.
